text: Henry Penk (19 July 1934 â€“ 22 June 2020) was an English footballer. He played as a winger. He was born in Wigan, Greater Manchester. He began his career in non-league football with Wigan Athletic, making 55 appearances in the Lancashire Combination before joining Portsmouth in September 1955."Harry Penk". Neil Brown. Retrieved 24 June 2010. He joined Plymouth Argyle in 1957. He was allowed to join Southampton in 1960,"Harry Penk". Greens on Screen. Retrieved 24 June 2010. and spent four years there. He later moved to Salisbury and Cowes. Penk died on 20 June 2020 in Hampshire, aged 85. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Southampton F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Greater Manchester Category:People from Wigan Category:Portsmouth F.C. players
title: Harry Penk
